title: Looking Back and Moving Forward
description: Daniel reviews his experience, progress, and future learning plans.
speaker: Daniel
text: Over the past few months, I have learned many new things in my daily life.
At the beginning, some tasks felt difficult and sometimes stressful.
With time, I practiced more and started to understand things better.
I became more organized at work and more confident in my decisions.
I also learned how to manage my time and handle small problems calmly.
Now, I feel more comfortable using English in simple situations.
I can understand conversations more easily and follow short stories.
In the future, I want to keep improving step by step.
I am going to practice listening and speaking regularly.
I believe this progress will help me reach the next level with confidence.
